entities.name: hissing wand
entities.description: Hermione's wand that got snapped, mentioned in the context of Harry and Ron's conversation.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron Weasley, a student at Hogwarts, mentioned as being upset about his mood not improving after seeing Hermione's Transfiguration project.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione Granger, a student at Hogwarts, mentioned as showing off her Transfiguration project and teaching Harry about Defence Against the Dark Arts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter, a student at Hogwarts, mentioned as changing the subject to ask what they have this afternoon.

relationships.description: Ron is upset about his mood not improving after seeing Hermione's Transfiguration project, implying that the snapped wand was a source of frustration for him.
Hermione is teaching Ron about Defence Against the Dark Arts and showing off her Transfiguration project, indicating a relationship of instruction between them.
Harry is learning from Hermione about Defence Against the Dark Arts and seeing her Transfiguration project, indicating a relationship of instruction between them.
